 2023-06382023-06-22ESDC
ActDepartment of Employment and Social Development Act
PrecisAppointment of STEPHEN LAWRENCE BERGEN of Kamloops, British Columbia, to be a full-time member of the Social Security Tribunal for the Appeal Division, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective July 24, 2023.
